resources.string: We are very happy that you want to try this application.
Easy detection of computers, saving data about them, detecting services... Is this what you are looking for?
These are several functions that you will find in this application.
Try it and enjoy the functionality from the first moments.

NetDroid is an application developed to assist network administrators in their everyday tasks by providing them basic network diagnostic tools in a handheld device. It allows you to scan the network to look for accessible devices, perform a port-scan on them and analyze neighbouring WiFi networks.

Port scanning (also known as port-knocking) is considered illegal in several countries or has not defined legal status. We do not take any responsibility for the usage of this appliaction in any action against the local law
